content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Emilia, thank you for considering my apartment. I understand that you are looking for a place to rent and I am happy to help you find a suitable solution. Based on our discussion, I believe that the rental price for this apartment would be €800 per month. This is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in a prime location in Mannheim. Would you be interested in accepting this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I agree to the price of 800 Euro. Thank you for your help. I will move in on the 1st of July.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Thank you for choosing my apartment, Emilia. I am glad to hear that you have agreed to the rental price of €800 per month. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns before your move-in date on July 1st. I look forward to welcoming you as my new tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can you please send me a copy of the rental agreement?

Thank you very much for your help.

Best regards,
Emilia Müller
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Emilia. I will send you a copy of the rental agreement as soon as possible. Please let me know if you have any questions or concerns. I am happy to help you with anything you need. Thank you for choosing my apartment and for being a great tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine
